dict.acceptation: 滑，滑脱；犯过失，出错；（时间）不知不觉地过去；（健康状况等）变差；
使顺利滑动；摆脱；放松，松开；
跌倒，失足；纸条；失误，口误；事故；
滑动的；可拆卸的；打有活结的；
串行线路接口协议(Serial Line Interface Protocol)；

sent.orig: PPP, the Point-to-Point Protocol, corrects all the deficiencies in SLIP. PPP consists of three components.
sent.trans: 点到点协议，更正了所有SLIP的不足，PPP由3部分组成。

sent.orig: Faults which show both dip-slip and strike-slip motion are known as oblique-slip faults.
sent.trans: 断层既有倾滑又有走滑运动特征的被称为斜滑断层。

sent.orig: Non-slip surface: The bottom of bathtub should have non-slip surface to guarantee your safety.
sent.trans: 防滑表面：浴缸底面须有防滑表面，确保您的安全。

sent.orig: The grinding part is fixed on the basis frame and can slip relatively to anti-slip buffer.
sent.trans: 研磨部设置在基架上，并可相对于缓冲止滑结构移动。

sent.orig: Sudden rupture and displacement occurs with normal, reverse, strike-slip, or oblique-slip faulting.
sent.trans: 突然破裂和位移伴随正、逆、走向滑动或斜向滑动断层作用而发生。
